SELECT M.TITLE TITLE, NVL(STAR, 0) STAR FROM MOVIES M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MOVIEID, AVG(STAR) STAR FROM COMMENTS WHERE MOVIEID = ANY(SELECT DISTINCT(M.ID) FROM SHOWS S JOIN ROOMS R ON S.ROOMID = R.ID JOIN MOVIES M ON S.MOVIEID = M.ID WHERE THEATERNAME = #{theaterName}) GROUP BY MOVIEID) S ON M.ID = S.MOVIEID
ORDER BY STAR DESC

SELECT MOVIEID FROM SHOWS WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT RATING FROM MOVIES WHERE ID = #{id}
